data.system_settings: MacBook Air Early 2015, macOS High Sierra 10.13.4
data.expected_result: The grey line stays visible consistently
data.short_description: The small grey separation line between the text area and the insert button disappears at certain zoom levels
data.steps_to_repro: - Start Discord on 100% zoom - Zoom in and out, observing the tiny grey line especially at 90% and 75% zoom.
